Jeetu's elder sister-in-law and sister ridicule Priyamvada for her late pregnancy. For the first time, Durga defends Priyamvada for her dutifulness and chastises the others for their selfishness.

node_2: stranger who speaks ill of the kaushik family
edge: Nakul overhears this, and responds curtly, defending his mother and family. This leads to a rift in his relationship but makes him realize that he has mistreated his parents.
Gullar reveals to Nakul that he was beat up by someone at school after standing up for his mother, and both the brothers bond over their recent experiences.
When one of them taunts him, he gives a befitting reply.
Priyamvada encourages Nakul to make amends with Renee and Sangeeta, which he does.

As the preparations for the baby shower commence, Priyamvada goes into labor at and is immediately taken to the hospital. After the delivery, the doctor announces the birth of a baby girl, the family is overjoyed.
Nakul and Renee get engaged in the presence of their families, including his baby sister.
